title: Edgeville Incident

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Edgeville incident was a military conflict that occurred in Edgeville between the Kinshra, White Knights, Temple Knights, and Solus Dellagar. Over 800 civilians, as well as the same number of white knights and black knights were killed during the battle,[1] earning Solus Dellagar the nicknames 'Murder-mage' and 'Mad Solus.'[2] Solus Dellagar was captured by the Temple Knights during the incident.[3] The event is referenced heavily in the Commorb dossiers during and after the Wanted! quest.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Edgeville Incident
Edgeville incident
Date Some time during the Fifth Age
Conflict Kinshra - White Knight Conflicts
Place Edgeville
Outcome Arrest of Solus Dellagar, appointment of new Kinshra Lord.
Combatants
Solus Dellagar Kinshra, Temple Knights, White Knights, Ghost Town residents
Commanders
Solus Dellagar Lord Shadwell, unknown Temple and White Knight leaders
Strength
One powerful wizard 800+ each of Kinshra and White Knights, unknown number of Temple Knights
Casualties
None 800+ civilians, 800+ each of Kinshra and White Knights, Lord Shadwell, unknown number of Temple Knights

The Edgeville incident was a military conflict that occurred in Edgeville between the Kinshra, White Knights, Temple Knights, and Solus Dellagar. Over 800 civilians, as well as the same number of white knights and black knights were killed during the battle,[1] earning Solus Dellagar the nicknames 'Murder-mage' and 'Mad Solus.'[2] Solus Dellagar was captured by the Temple Knights during the incident.[3] The event is referenced heavily in the Commorb dossiers during and after the Wanted! quest.

After the death of Lord Shadwell during the battle, Lord Daquarius was unanimously voted into leadership by the Kinshra. He was the youngest ever Black Knight to the leader of the Kinshra.[4]

Solus Dellagar, the Murder Mage.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Commorb v2, "Wanted!", Old School RuneScape. "but not after the wilful[sic] slaughter of over 800 civilians, as well as an equal number of White and Black Knights."
  2. ^ Commorb v2, "Wanted!", Old School RuneScape. "He earned the nickname 'Murder-mage' and 'Mad Solus' in the incident at Edgeville."
  3. ^ Commorb v2, "Wanted!", Old School RuneScape. "he was eventually apprehended by one of our field teams."
  4. ^ Commorb v2, "Wanted!", Old School RuneScape. "The charismatic Lord Daquarius was the youngest Black Knight to ever take lead of the Kinshra, being unanimously voted into leadership after the death of Lord Shadwell in the infamous incident at Edgeville."

The '''Edgeville incident''' was a military conflict that occurred in [[Edgeville]] between the [[Kinshra]], [[White Knights]], [[Temple Knights]], and [[Solus Dellagar]]. Over 800 civilians, as well as the same number of white knights and black knights were killed during the battle,{{CiteNPC|npc=Commorb v2|loc=Wanted!|quote=but not after the wilful{{sic}} slaughter of over 800 civilians, as well as an equal number of White and Black Knights.}} earning Solus Dellagar the nicknames 'Murder-mage' and 'Mad Solus.'{{CiteNPC|npc=Commorb v2|loc=Wanted!|quote=He earned the nickname 'Murder-mage' and 'Mad Solus' in the incident at Edgeville.}} Solus Dellagar was captured by the Temple Knights during the incident.{{CiteNPC|npc=Commorb v2|loc=Wanted!|quote=he was eventually apprehended by one of our field teams.}} The event is referenced heavily in the [[Commorb]] dossiers during and after the [[Wanted!]] quest.

After the death of [[Lord Shadwell]] during the battle, [[Lord Daquarius]] was unanimously voted into leadership by the Kinshra. He was the youngest ever Black Knight to the leader of the Kinshra.{{CiteNPC|npc=Commorb v2|loc=Wanted!|quote=The charismatic Lord Daquarius was the youngest Black Knight to ever take lead of the Kinshra, being unanimously voted into leadership after the death of Lord Shadwell in the infamous incident at Edgeville.}}

[[File:Solus Dellagar.png|right|thumb|150px|Solus Dellagar, the Murder Mage.]]
